Containers.Name: Google-MusicManager
Containers.Description: Allows uploading of local music files for use with the Google Play Music service.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/appdata[/b] The working directory of Google Music Manager, where application logs and internal database files are stored[br][br] [b]/music[b] The music directory that should be synchronized with Google Play Music [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']5900[/span] is the port exposed by the VNC server[br]
Containers.Overview: Upload your personal music collection to Google Play Music
